mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER ( USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE_NO, ADDRESS, GENDER, BIRTH_DATE, PRE_GENRE1, PRE_GENRE2, USER_NICK, JOIN_DATE, STATUS, PROFILE_URL ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{phoneNo}, #{address}, #{gender}, #{birthDate}, #{preGenre1}, #{preGenre2}, #{userNick}, #{joinDate}, #{status}, #{profileUrl} )
